Method Detail

getContent

public Content getContent(String path)
                   throws IOException
obtains a Content for the given path by drilling down from the root Folders of this Source. The path is parsed by getContentForPath which allows the use of either "/" or "\" separators.

Specified by:
getContent in interface Source
Parameters:
path - the path of the desired Content.
Returns:
the Content found, null if no Content found
Throws:
IOException - if any problems occur when obtaining the Content
